description: Benchmark History Report Cleanup and UI Refinement - Remove legacy scripts and unify visual design across history and single-run reports.

userStories.title: Remove legacy generation scripts
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to remove unused and 'simple' versions of the report generators to clean up the workspace.
acceptanceCriteria: Search codebase and update any references to these files in shell scripts or package.json

userStories.title: Extract shared CSS and Design Constants
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a single source of truth for the 'Neon' styling to ensure consistency across both reports.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Metrics/SharedStyles.ts that exports a CSS string
Move existing report CSS from HTMLGenerator.ts into SharedStyles.ts
Ensure all necessary classes for both history and single-run views are included

userStories.title: Update History Report to use Shared Styles
userStories.description: As a user, I want the History Report to look like the main Benchmark Report so the UI feels cohesive.
acceptanceCriteria: Update HistoryManager.ts (or equivalent history generator) to use CSS from SharedStyles.ts
Refactor History Report HTML structure to use the same class names as the main report
Verify benchmark_history.html renders with the Neon theme
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Update Single Run Report to use Shared Styles
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Single Run Report to consume the new shared styles to verify the refactor didn't break it.
acceptanceCriteria: Update HTMLGenerator.ts to import CSS from SharedStyles.ts
Verify benchmark_report.html still renders correctly without regression
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
